name: Gaoren Networking
tag_list: education, skill, learn, teach, student, teacher, study, entrepreneur
overview:
You can learn anything from anyone!

The company focuses education market in China through the website Xuejineng.cn which provides a marketplace for teachers and students.

According to China Daily, there were 1M high school students did not consider to go to universities in China in 2010. the reasons are:

  1. Except the top Chines universities, tertiary education institutions runs for too much profits, and what they are selling is a piece of graduation certificate.
  2. Young people cannot learn new skills from the universities. University brings them theories and principles written in heavy books.

Everyone is talking about China rising these days. The founders of Xuejineng don’t agree with the idea which to use the nation’s GDP to measure China rising, what they believe is that the real China rising depends on EDUCATION and People’s cultivation. They also believe that our community is the best place for skill learning and teaching.
